product_name: Society Premium Green Tea 250G Jar: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: I was not expecting any good quality in this price but wanted to try this because I literally not wanted to buy all those big brand green teaAfter receiving the product I was amazed by the quality of the product the leaves are extremely long there is no chance of adulteration in the product.Quality,quantity and price is amazingIn this price you will not find any 250g green teaTaste is good not bitter as compared to lipton green teaPlus you will get this in a plastic jar so there is no tension of storing it.You can make your green tea toner at homeIf this review was helpful do click on "helpful" icon and follow me on YouTube @keebisha

Unlike most of the green tea available in the market this item contains full long leaves which takes more times to release is flavour but the taste is better than any other green tea i ever tasted plus there is no additional flavour so you can add any flavour whenever you want

I must say those people who give nagetive comment that this tea is not bad at all. Firstly I love it as Its come with a jar n tastes also good. We have to take very little n immerse in boiling water only for 5 minute dn it will not taste bitter. This is my 3rd bottle I am going to order now....

Tbh the best green tea available in India. I‚Äôm totally impressed by its quality, I expected a dusty container for the price but it just blew me away. The flavour is just like the ones I‚Äôve bought abroad at a higher rate. TRUE LOVE GAHHüíñüíñ

reviews.review_title: Equal quality green tea as top brands.
reviews.review_body: ProsLow costSame quality as top brandsPET Jar container sealed packNo cons identified yet.

This green tea comes in an easy to use jar which makes it convenient to use. Plus the leaves of this green tea are long and flavourful. Only one spoon of tea leaves are sufficient to make two mugs of green tea.
Pure leaf tea .... Great taste if you are a tea lover. Cannot say it is the 1st quality , but at this price 5 stars
